headline: Nuclear stock rally continues to grow
summary: Nuclear stocks like Oklo (OKLO) and Constellation Energy (CEG) are continuing to rally on President Trump's bid to increase nuclear power production. In the video above, Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré takes a closer look at the stocks on the move. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: Cathie Wood Sold These Nuclear Stocks As Trump's Executive Orders Sent The Sector Soaring
summary: Cathie Wood and her Ark Invest funds decided to trim positions in two nuclear plays on Friday, as nuclear-related stocks soared broadly.  President Donald Trump provided the impetus for the rally, signing executive orders to ease regulations for new nuclear reactors, while enhancing fuel supply chains.  Wood's ARK Autonomous Tech ETF on Friday sold 97,238 shares of the nuclear-power startup Oklo for an estimated $4.75 million, according to Wood's ETF daily trade disclosures.

headline: Nuclear stocks extend rally as Trump aims to quadruple US nuclear capacity by 2050
summary: Nuclear stocks extended gains on Tuesday as President Trump's executive orders signed on Friday boosted the sector.
